51#ifndef AM_HAL_DCU_H
52#define AM_HAL_DCU_H
53
54#ifdef __cplusplus
55extern "C"
56{
57#endif
58
59#define AM_HAL_DCU_NUMDCU 21 // Number of valid bits
60
61// Qualified DCU Controls
62#define AM_HAL_DCU_CPUDBG_INVASIVE 0x00000002UL
63#define AM_HAL_DCU_CPUDBG_NON_INVASIVE 0x00000004UL
64#define AM_HAL_DCU_CPUTRC_ETM 0x00000008UL
65#define AM_HAL_DCU_CPUTRC_DWT_SWO 0x00000010UL
66#define AM_HAL_DCU_CPUTRC_PERFCNT 0x00000020UL
67#define AM_HAL_DCU_CACHEDBG 0x00000040UL
68#define AM_HAL_DCU_CM4DBG 0x00000080UL
69#define AM_HAL_DCU_CPUDBG_S_INVASIVE 0x00000200UL
70#define AM_HAL_DCU_CPUDBG_S_NON_INVASIVE 0x00000400UL
71#define AM_HAL_DCU_SWD 0x00000800UL
72#define AM_HAL_DCU_TRACE 0x00004000UL
73
74
75// Following macros define Raw DCU Values as in HOSTDCU registers
76// These are provided only for reference
77// The HAL APIs work only with Qualified values (AM_HAL_DCU_* above)
78
79// 3 bit encoding for individual DCU fields
80#define AM_HAL_DCURAWVAL_ENABLE 0x5
81#define AM_HAL_DCURAWVAL_DISABLE 0x2
82#define AM_HAL_DCURAWVAL_MASK 0x7
83
84// Raw DCU control masks
85#define AM_HAL_DCURAW_CPUDBG_INVASIVE 0x0000000000000007ULL
86#define AM_HAL_DCURAW_CPUDBG_NON_INVASIVE 0x0000000000000038ULL
87#define AM_HAL_DCURAW_CPUTRC_DWT_SWO 0x0000000000000E00ULL
88#define AM_HAL_DCURAW_CPUTRC_PERFCNT 0x0000000000007000ULL
89#define AM_HAL_DCURAW_CACHEDBG 0x0000000000038000ULL
90#define AM_HAL_DCURAW_CM4DBG 0x00000000001C0000ULL
91#define AM_HAL_DCURAW_CPUDBG_S_INVASIVE 0x0000000007000000ULL
92#define AM_HAL_DCURAW_CPUDBG_S_NON_INVASIVE 0x0000000038000000ULL
93#define AM_HAL_DCURAW_SWD 0x00000001C0000000ULL
94#define AM_HAL_DCURAW_TRACE 0x0000038000000000ULL
95
96
97// All possible controls
98#define AM_HAL_DCURAW_MASK 0x00000381FF1FFFFFULL
99#define AM_HAL_DCURAW_ENABLE 0x000002816D16DB6DULL
100#define AM_HAL_DCURAW_DISABLE 0x0000010092092492ULL
101
102// Convenience wrappers
104#define am_hal_dcu_enable(ui32Mask) am_hal_dcu_update(true, (ui32Mask))
106#define am_hal_dcu_disable(ui32Mask) am_hal_dcu_update(false, (ui32Mask))
107
108//*****************************************************************************
109//
117//
118//*****************************************************************************
119extern uint32_t am_hal_dcu_lock_status_get(uint32_t *pui32Val);
120
121//*****************************************************************************
122//
130//
131//*****************************************************************************
132extern uint32_t am_hal_dcu_lock(uint32_t ui32Mask);
133
134//*****************************************************************************
135//
143//
144//*****************************************************************************
145extern uint32_t am_hal_dcu_get(uint32_t *pui32Val);
146
147//*****************************************************************************
148//
157//
158//*****************************************************************************
159extern uint32_t am_hal_dcu_update(bool bEnable, uint32_t ui32Mask);
160
161//*****************************************************************************
162//
171//
172//*****************************************************************************
173extern uint32_t am_hal_dcu_mcuctrl_override(uint32_t ui32Mask);
174
175//*****************************************************************************
176//
180//
181//*****************************************************************************
182extern uint32_t am_hal_dcu_swo_enable(void);
183
184
185#ifdef __cplusplus
186}
187#endif
188
189#endif // AM_HAL_DCU_H
